content: this simple circle granny square is a versatile motif that can be used for a wide variety of projects it differs from traditional granny squares in that it is formed starting with a circle that transitions into a square you can also use the circle as the basis for an applique this pattern is in english and uses us terminology abbreviations are included skill level 1 beginner materials worsted 4 weight yarn us 8 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors measurement approx 5″ x 5″ 13 cm x 13 cm this pattern is for personal use only please do not claim this pattern as your own sell or distribute it you may sell finished products made using this pattern in small quantities
